value0.value0: You may drive off of the paved roadway to pass another vehicle

value0.value1: Loading zone for passengers or mail only

value0.value1: You should never drive faster than is safe for current conditions

value0.value1: Both of the above

25 mph

value2.value: When you entered the intersection on the green light

value0.value0: When turning left from a multi-lane one-way road onto another one-way road, start your turn from
value0.value1: The far left lane

value2.value: The far right lane
Any lane

value0.value1: Stop at the solid white limit line

value2.value: Stop at the solid white limit line

value0.value0: When you approach a roundabout, you must enter to the _________ of the central island
value0.value1: Right

value2.value: Center
Right
Left

value0.value0: At an intersection, you should yield to another vehicle
value0.value1: In both of the above situations

value2.value: If the vehicle is just starting to enter the intersection
If the vehicle is to your right and arrived at the same time as you
In both of the above situations

value0.value0: Flashing yellow lights on a school bus require other drivers to
value0.value1: Slow their vehicles and prepare to stop

value2.value: Slow their vehicles and pass with caution
Pass quickly
Slow their vehicles and prepare to stop

value0.value1: Yield to the pedestrian

value0.value0: You may not pass another vehicle except
value0.value1: When there is a broken yellow line next to your lane

value2.value: When there is a broken yellow line next to your lane
On the right shoulder of the highway
When there is a school bus on the same roadway with flashing lights

value0.value0: On two-lane highways, you are allowed to pass
value0.value1: When there is a broken yellow line on your side of the center dividing line

value2.value: While crossing or within 100 feet of a railroad crossing
When you are approaching the top of a hill or are on a curve, and there is no clear view ahead
When there is a broken yellow line on your side of the center dividing line

value0.value0: If someone is following you too closely, you must
value0.value1: Slow down and encourage the driver to pass

value2.value: Slow down and encourage the driver to pass
Discourage this action and not allow the driver to pass
Increase your speed

value0.value0: If you see two solid yellow lines on a roadway, it means that
value0.value1: No passing is permitted

value2.value: No passing is permitted
Passing is permitted during the day
Passing is permitted at any time

value0.value1: The vehicle cannot travel faster than 25 mph

value2.value: The vehicle can travel faster than 25 mph
The vehicle cannot travel faster than 25 mph

value0.value0: If a driver extends his or her left arm out horizontally, it indicates that the driver is going to
value0.value1: Make a left turn

value2.value: Stop the vehicle

value2.value: Double solid white lines
Single solid yellow lines
Single solid white lines

value0.value0: With any turning vehicle, the rear wheels follow a _________ than the front wheels
value0.value1: Shorter path

value2.value: Longer path

Slower path

value0.value1: The lane nearest to the right edge of the road

value2.value: The far left lane

value0.value0: If you are parallel parked on the right-hand side of the street, you should __________ before pulling out into traffic

value0.value1: You may either proceed straight ahead or turn left
